item.description: FEBRUARY 8 (Friday) SINGLES HAPPY HOUR at Cugino's Restaurant in Newington starting at 5 pm. They're looking forward to our visit. Come join us after work for a great time and mingle with old and new friends! It's a nice way to end the work week. There is no charge. For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions to 1076 Main Street: I-84 to Exit 39A New Britain/Newington (Rt. 9S), then take Exit 29 Ella Grasso Boulevard (Rt. 175), turn right, go about 1.5 miles, at light turn right onto Rt. 176S, facility on left. For parking, go just past Cugino's, turn left into public parking in back.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside at a table waiting to meet you.
item.why: You'll love it because we offer a relaxed, comfortable, welcoming atmosphere for you and other singles to socialize and have fun!

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Happy Hour
